item.description:
Join us for an interactive, fun and informative workshop that explores your own “Wheel of Life” to increase positive thinking and fulfillment. Learn how your values can help you achieve greater fulfillment and balance as you pursue your New Year’s goals!

Workshop Objectives

~ Provide an interactive, fun and educational workshop for attendees
~ Review the “Wheel of Life” to look across your “whole” life and how to increase balance and fulfillment
~ Present tips and strategies to increase positive mind set for achieving goals
~Identify steps and resources that can make your goals and fulfillment more attainable

 Mary Stager, CPCC and Founder of re-thinc, LLC is a Business Consultant and Certified Professional Co-Active Coach specialized in small businesses success. Offering Sales Consulting, Executive/Leadership Coaching & Team Development, Mary’s approach to success is all about clarifying goals and simplifying the steps to achieve them so people can work smarter, not harder.  With over 25 years experience, Mary's client list has included companies such as ESPN, Black & Decker, Channel 3, Hartford Hospital, Cartier plus many others.
item.how_to_find_us: Village Walk Shopping Center, Building 700, Suite 722
item.name: Managing Your Mindset–Living Life with Greater Fulfillment™ with Mary Stager
